mapper.select: select * from r_board f order by r_idx desc limit #{startNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into r_board (idx,title,content, r_cnt, nick,ps_nick ,rate) values (#{idx},#{title},#{content},#{r_cnt},#{nick},#{ps_nick},#{rate})
mapper.update: update r_board set title =#{title}, content=#{content} , rate=#{rate} where r_idx=#{r_idx}
mapper.select: select * from r_board where idx=#{idx} and password =#{password}
mapper.update: update r_board set r_cnt = r_cnt +1 where r_idx=#{r_idx}
